Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you
Name: H Shamah
Clean_Text_Body: book insurance customer service supportive drastically change file claim initially submit claim cancel travel week ago repeatedly ask documentation supply promptly include original claim request time appear claim process design procrastinate payment automate email generate provide limited information status claim email respond phone call pay claim thank

Title: I have not had a claim so I cannot tell…
Body: I have not had a claim so I cannot tell you how good the service will be in this area.  As far as issuing the contract I had no problems except for the pandemic which of course made the policy useless.  We did not travel anywhere for the past year and will not travel anywhere this year. So we are not buying an annual contract again at this time.  Once it is safe to travel internationally I will be buying another contract.

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.
Name: Tracy Goralczyk
Clean_Text_Body: want confidence travel purchase insurance trust give confidence trip cancel work reason base new cdc guideline travel outside country claim deny cancel  fear  covid listen choice definitely fear shame roam right twist fine print take advantage customer time like living uncertainty

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". RoamRight is doing everything possible to not have to process the Claim. They refuse to have a conversation on the phone and instead default to email and closing our your Claim without an explanation. Look elsewhere. This service deserves legal attention.
Name: Zach Theis
Clean_Text_Body: roamright right actually file claim moment incredibly slow nonresponsive  need information  roamright possible process claim refuse conversation phone instead default email closing claim explanation look service deserve legal attention

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.
Name: Kelsey H
Clean_Text_Body: buy year long policy january   roamright accept payment issue policy week later roamright announce honor policy covid relate claim retroactively january th plan roam guess company right total waste money

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S
Clean_Text_Body: unfortunately pandemic border closure ensue able utilise insurance purchase plan trip uk new york portugal south africa trip cancel quarantine regulation airline stoppage wish policy able extended  hope trip premium  great deal lose possible appreciate contact company try contact customer service unable reach anyoneafter leave review contact customer service discus situation roam right agree refund premium notify trip cancel satisfied result use company start travel

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Disappointed

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.
Name: Tracy Goralczyk

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". RoamRight is doing everything possible to not have to process the Claim. Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.
Name: Tracy Goralczyk

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". RoamRight is doing everything possible to not have to process the Claim. They refuse to have a conversation on the phone and instead default to email and closing our your Claim without an explanation. Look elsewhere. This service deserves legal attention.

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim. Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed

Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid. Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence. Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". RoamRight is doing everything possible to not have to process the Claim. They refuse to have a conversation on the phone and instead default to email and closing our your Claim without an explanation. Look elsewhere. This service deserves legal attention.

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Claim communication wasn't the best

But I will definitely use them again in the future for travel.

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you
Name: H Shamah
Clean_Text_Body: book insurance customer service supportive drastically change file claim initially submit claim cancel travel week ago repeatedly ask documentation supply promptly include original claim request time appear claim process design procrastinate payment automate email generate provide limited information status claim email respond phone call pay claim thank

Body: I have not had a claim so I cannot tell you how good the service will be in this area.  As far as issuing the contract I had no problems except for the pandemic which of course made the policy useless.  We did not travel anywhere for the past year and will not travel anywhere this year. So we are not buying an annual contract again at this time.  Once it is safe to travel internationally I will be buying another contract.

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.
Name: Tracy Goralczyk
Clean_Text_Body: want confidence travel purchase insurance trust give confidence trip cancel work reason base new cdc guideline travel outside country claim deny cancel  fear  covid listen choice definitely fear shame roam right twist fine print take advantage customer time like living uncertainty

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". RoamRight is doing everything possible to not have to process the Claim. They refuse to have a conversation on the phone and instead default to email and closing our your Claim without an explanation. Look elsewhere. This service deserves legal attention.
Name: Zach Theis
Clean_Text_Body: roamright right actually file claim moment incredibly slow nonresponsive  need information  roamright possible process claim refuse conversation phone instead default email closing claim explanation look service deserve legal attention

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.
Name: Kelsey H
Clean_Text_Body: buy year long policy january   roamright accept payment issue policy week later roamright announce honor policy covid relate claim retroactively january th plan roam guess company right total waste money

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S
Clean_Text_Body: unfortunately pandemic border closure ensue able utilise insurance purchase plan trip uk new york portugal south africa trip cancel quarantine regulation airline stoppage wish policy able extended  hope trip premium  great deal lose possible appreciate contact company try contact customer service unable reach anyoneafter leave review contact customer service discus situation roam right agree refund premium notify trip cancel satisfied result use company start travel

Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid. Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.

Title: Goodluck if you actually have to file a claim with RoamRight...
Body: RoamRight does everything right up until you actually have to file a claim. At that moment, they are incredibly slow, nonresponsive and full of "I need more information". Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. I plan to Roam again and if you guess it will be without this company you will be Right. Total waste of money.
Name: Kelsey H

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Please pay my claim.
Body: When I was booking the insurance customer service was very supportive. That has drastically changed now that I have filed a claim.  Since initially submitting my claim for cancelled travel eight weeks ago I have been repeatedly asked for more documentation. All of which I supplied promptly and all of which could have been included with my original claim, had it been requested at that time. It appears that the claim process is designed to procrastinate payment.  Other than the automated email generated to provide the most limited amount of information regarding the status my claim, my email is not responded to, nor are my phone calls.  Please pay my claim. Thank you

Title: Disappointed
Body: I want confidence when I travel.  I purchased this insurance with trust and it gave me confidence.  When my trip had to be cancelled for a work reason based on new CDC guidelines for travel outside the country my claim was denied because I was cancelling for "fear" of Covid.  Nobody would even listen that it was not my choice and it was definitely not fear.  Shame on roam right for twisting fine print and taking advantage of customers in a time like we are living in with so much uncertainty.

Title: Changed the rules after the fact. avoid this cmpany
Body: I bought a year long policy on January 26, 2020.  RoamRight accepted my payment and issued the policy. Over a week later, RoamRight announced that they would not honor the policy for Covid related claims retroactively to January 20th. Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
Name: Patricia S

Title: Will Roam Right do the Right Thing?
Body: After a number of years, 2020 will be last year we purchase travel insurance from Arch Roam Right for the two of us. As in purchasing any insurance, one wants to know if insurance companies will  readily assist their customers when a legitimate claim (s) is filed according to the policy or be adversarial toward claimants in order to place profit ahead of the good of their customers. This past year we purchased travel insurance in December 2019 for 2020 travels, Then March, 2020 the Covid-19 pandemic hit, like most all our planned travels (5) for the whole year were cancelled. Our travel agencies, airline companies  and resorts either refunded or credited us all payments made for trips in 2020. Many of our travel partners also received credit for future use or refund from their travel insurance companies for cancelled trips.We contacted Roam Right twice requesting credit for future use or refund for travel insurance paid for 2020 based on the cancellations of all our trips. In both cases, we were told the that the policy of the company was not to provide any numerations....no reason(s) given.  In conclusion, here is a company willing to take payment and offer no commodity, service, liability or even a chance of liability....in other words pure profit.  So what do I draw from this. I can't help but deduct that Roam Right would be a company to shrug or skirt any responsibility if we were to file a claim.   In the end, we really want to feel secure knowing any insurance company will have our back according to the purchased policy or service. I don't have that with this Roam Right Insurance.  I am glad to find this out before something really happened abroad!!!
Name: Mole
Clean_Text_Body: number year  year purchase travel insurance arch roam right purchase insurance want know insurance company readily assist customer legitimate claim file accord policy adversarial claimant order place profit ahead good customer past year purchase travel insurance december   travel march  covid pandemic hit like plan travel  year cancel travel agency airline company resort refund credited payment trip  travel partner receive credit future use refund travel insurance company cancel tripswe contact roam right twice request credit future use refund travel insurance pay  base cancellation trip case tell policy company provide numeration  no reason give conclusion company willing payment offer commodity service liability chance liability  in word pure profit draw help deduct roam right company shrug skirt responsibility file claim end want feel secure know insurance company accord purchased policy service roam right insurance glad find happen abroad

Title: Problem resolved
Body: Unfortunately, due to the pandemic and all the border closures that ensued, I was not able to utilise the insurance that I purchased.  I had planned trips to the UK, New York, Portugal, & South Africa and all the trips were cancelled due to quarantine regulations as well as airline stoppages.  I wish the policy was able to be extended to 2021 when I hope to take the same trips.  The premium of $574 is a great deal to lose.  If this is possible, I would appreciate being contacted by the company.  I have tried to contact their customer service but have been unable to reach anyone.After leaving this review I was contacted by their customer service to discuss the situation.  Roam Right has agreed to refund my premium from when I was notified that my first trip was cancelled.  I am very satisfied with this result and would use the company again when we can start traveling again.
